attributes.action: apoint Mr Rick Mayall as an Independent Commissioner to oversee MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
public trust and confidence in the system of MPs expenses can only be restored by a proper and transparent scrutiny.

Mr Rick Mayall is a suitable appointee, given his independent status and professional insight into the problem.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
